---
name: "Feature: Member Management"
about: "Track individual members with more details than just email."
title: "[Feature] Member Management"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: []
---

**Problem:**
Currently, only emails are tracked for participants.

**Proposed Solution:**
Add a member model with name, grade, and contact info. Allow viewing and editing member details.

**Benefits:**
- Richer data for each participant
- Enables future features like attendance, communication, and analytics

**Additional context:**
See Evolvve-Student-Chapter-App for reference.
